com.google.apples.review_contents: I can't even use the app without it crashing after 30 seconds, 1 minute if I'm lucky. The updates don't help and I've lost count of how many times I've sent a report after every time its crashed.

Stop updating my news feed when I'm looking at it! Give me the option to update when I want to.  Its extremely annoying when I'm reading a post and suddenly it updates and I have to go find it again, and a lot of the time I can't find the post again.
